name: ASSOCIATION OF NATIONAL ESTUARY PROGRAMS
sampleDescriptions: Building support in Congress and the Administration for supporting the mission of the National Estuary Program, as established in section 320 of the Clean Water Act.
Building support in Congress and the Administration for supporting the mission of the National Estuary Program, as established in section 320 of the Clean Water Act.
Building support in Congress and the Administration for supporting the mission of the National Estuary Program, as established in section 320 of the Clean Water Act.
Building support in Congress and the Administration for supporting the mission of the National Estuary Program, as established in section 320 of the Clean Water Act.
Ensure adequate funding for the National Estuary Program.  Begin discussions about reauthorizing the program ahead of 2021, when authority for the program will lapse.
